item.description:
Join us for one of our small group "house meetups" at the home of member Paul Ridlon in Portland. Paul will be showing us his great gardens, rain water cistern and backyard tipi - to name a few features!

6:30 Meet and have a casual guided tour with Paul
7:15-ish Potluck Supper
8:00 Announcements and Discussion
8:30-ish Wrap-up

Potluck Breakdown
Last Name A-G: Bring a salad or side dish
Last Name H-M: Bring a snack or appetizer-type item
Last Name N-S: Bring bread or a beverage
Last Name T-Z: [Also] Bring a dessert

*Please avoid bringing any foods containing peanuts or peanut products due to an allergy situation*

Please see our Meetup Event RSVP Guidelines:
http://permaculture.m...

Please remember to bring your own potluck kit (plate/bowl/utensils/cup/napkin)! Please consider bringing your digital camera and posting up a few photos after the event!

Potluck food safety ideas here:
http://fycs.ifas.ufl....

group.name: Portland Maine Permaculture & The Resilience Hub

item.name: July House Meetup
